prompt:
Dream it. Type it. Use it.
Curate is your all-in-one tool to build and launch your next website.
refinedPrompt: Create an all-in-one website building platform called Curate that allows users to easily design, develop, and launch their websites. The platform should include intuitive drag-and-drop tools, customizable templates, and seamless integration with hosting services. Users should be able to create professional-looking websites without requiring coding knowledge, while also having the flexibility to customize their sites extensively.
